'lankawe pota patalawagath wama, bauddha sabhyathwaya ha rajya palanaya, santhanagatha wenasin sansthagatha wenasakata' athulu paricheda 14kin samanwitha mema kruthiya magin wama saha bauddha darshanaya ekwa gamankala yuthu bawa wimal wirawansha penwadi thibe.
mahinda rajapaksha mahatha rata bhara ganimata pera, nawika gamanagamanaya sambandhayen apa rata jathyantharaya samaga ganudenu kale ewan aakarayatayi.
mese abaddiyakata muhuna dunne thambauththegama madi widuhale jayamali nissanka (17) namathi dariyayi.
me inne issara hitapu aawegashili jawipe neweyi, athdakim walin paripurna wechcha parinatha wyaparayak dan thiyenne.

awanka deshapalana nayakayaku lesa janadarayata path wikramanayaka mahathage dehaya pasugiyada mathi sabayata genaenu labu athara rajaye saha wipakshaye mathi amathihu ohuta siya gaurawaya puda kalaha.
aanduwen aathwa sitimata uthsaha kirimen sirisena balaporoththu wanne, janathawa athara wadena wiruddhathwaya pili pannawimatath mathiwaranayedi thama pakshayata chanda ekathukara ganimatathya.
mehidi janadhipathi premadasa wisin chithranganita durakathanayen amathu athara thama kiyu deya asuwanam wijewirata mese sidu nowana bawa danwiya.
namuth samaharu kiyanne minissu blak mel karanna me de kala kiyalayi.
budu upatha da kalathurakin sidu wannaki.

punchi lamayek thula thiyana aparimitha uthsahaya, ath noharima wani gunanga nisa labena de thamayi kathawe thiyenne.
